headline: Pinned: Charity Match
body:
The Charity Match between Infidels F.C. and Shmuck F.C. is happening soon, at lunchtime on the 3G Pitch.

Tickets will be on sale after easter half term costing £1 each

The match has been postponed to the week/second week after Easter Holdiays.

Have you say on additions you would like to see by contacting us

More updates will follow.
author: Charity Match Organisers

headline: STAFF ANNOUNCEMENT!
body:
Infidels F.C. are pleased to announce the appointment of the new Substitutons manager:

Archie Naismith

Archie will assist the managing team in making and implementing substituions. In addition, the board will meet to ratify the new substituion policy..
author: Infidels Media Team

headline: Infidels 0 - 0 (4-3 Penalties) Reaction
body:
The WinFidels return for the 4th win a row today.

After a close fought game, Spencer C, Joey P, Zack R & Oliver ton stepped up to take a penalty with all scoring. Shumcks scored the first three before Isaac J stepped up for the fourth which was saved by Adam N. Adam N (Infidels F.C. Goalkeeper) was awarded todays Man of the Match.

The Infidels F.C. Management team commented 'It was an extremley poor management strategy from the Shmucks today - they lacked vision and the tactical knowledge of the game'

Zack Roberts, No.10 said 'Despite not being our best peformance, we still worked as a team to put the game to bed - a critical win for the Infidels'

One Shmuck F.C. informant told me 'Today we had a decent game, coming to 0-0 end of normal time. When our team has all its players, we will be stronger and get the points back that we need' (in their dreams)

More coming soon...
author: Infidels Media Team

headline: Kit Guessing Game
body:
Today the Infidels F.C. kits arrived looking absolutely fantastic. Big thanks to Joe H for ordering them. Now, look at the photo and see if you can guess who has got what name. (Answers at the bottom of the page)



From left to right

13. Le Montgom (can't be a hard guess)

7. JH

100. Ton

12. Shep

10. Predator

8. Waverider

21. Savage

33. Ssstutter

63. Squid game

9. Inches (not on photo)



































































































































































































13. Le Montgom = Montgom

7. JH = Joe H

100. Ton = Ollie H

12. Shep = Alfie Shep

10. Predator = Zack R

8. Waverider = Isaac

21. Savage = George L

33. Ssstutter = Ma

63. Squid Game = Kenny

9. Inches = Spencer
author: Infidels F.C. News Team

headline: Infidels 3 - 0 Shmucks: The Manager's Reaction
body:
On top of the table.

On top of the goal scoring table.

On top of the assist table.

On top of the world.


The Infidels' winning form continued today with a thrashing of Shmucks 3-0. Every player assisted in today's victory.

Ollie H, Infidels F.C. Co-Captain and goalscorer of 2 today said, 'Although I was the one to bag two goals today, it not just the Ollie Ton show. It comes down to the hard work, dedication and the passion of the rest of the team - to put it bluntly, I'd be nothing without the lads and I dedicate these goals today to their hard work'.

Up the Infidels!
author: Montgom, Infidels F.C. Manager

headline: Today: Infidels F.C. VS Shmuck F.C.
body:
Past match up between the two teams:

Infidel wins: 1

Shmuck wins: 2

Draws: 1



'So the wind is in our sails today - we've got to build on the momentum from the last game. The boys have got in early to talk tactics: and we're confident for today's game.

Up the Infidels, come on the boys!'

Montgom, Infidels F.C. Manager
author: Montgom, Infidels F.C. Manager

headline: Infidels 1 - 0 Shmucks: The Manager's Reaction
body:
The Infidels Strike Back...



In one of the greatest performances I’ve ever witnessed, we finally get a win on the board.

Every player put in a shift, ranging from the deadly upfront partnership of Ollie and Spencer, to the freight train of defence, Max. In a game shrouded in controversy due to events off the pitch, we turned up and delivered a result.

Up the Infidels!
author: Montgom, Infidels F.C. Manager

headline: Today: Infidels F.C. VS Shmuck F.C.
body:
Past match up between the two teams:

Infidel wins: 0

Shmuck wins: 1

Draws: 1



'So today is a big game – we’ve got a lot of proving to do that we can go out and win this. It's not going to be easy, the weather forecast predicts some rain so the conditions are not going to be easy.

Up the Infidels, Come on the boys!'

Montgom, Infidels F.C. Manager
author: Montgom, Infidels F.C. Manager

headline: Infidels 0 - 1 Shmucks: The Manager's Reaction
body:
It's definitely not the result we were looking for today. I don't think the score represents the effort the lads put in and I am disappointed in the outcome.

We've definitely got to make improvements on how we approach future games tactically.

With this in mind, onwards and upwards to our next match on Monday.
author: Montgom, Infidels F.C. Manager
